parameters.name: AlarmId
parameters.description:
The ID of the alert.

For more information about how to obtain the ID of an alert, see [ListAlertEvents](~~2612346~~).

parameters.name: Severity
parameters.description: The severity level of the alert. Valid values: P1, P2, P3, and P4. P4 indicates the lowest severity, whereas P1 indicates the highest severity.
